data.text:
Urban Company adds four independent directors to its board

https://t.co/YIE2kqIW4i

@abhirajbhal @urbancompany_UC 
#mediabrief #boardofdirectors #ireenavittal #ashishgupta #shyamalmukherjee #deepindergoyal #appointment #media

#PeopleSpotting: @urbancompany_UC appoints four new independent board members - Ireena Vittal, Ashish Gupta, Shyamal Mukherjee, & @deepigoyal.
#UrbanCompany | #boardofdirectors | #leadership | #business | #appointment | #Zomato | @abhirajbhal | @ShyamalM_

https://t.co/gitVQ4fcTG

So @urbancompany_UC sent a technician to resolve their previous blunder, that guy came and left after arguing for 30 minutes. 

Made us to cancel the request while @UC_Assist chose not to react at all.

got amc of water purifier done with @urbancompany_UC  but the complain is not being attend under amc despite 6 months is yet to go.  lodged complain and got reply that to get through oem and they will reimburse.  when i asked in writing the customer care person refused.

Bought RO from @urbancompany_UC customer support is non existent! The product has not been delivered for couple of days while the notification is out for delivery. App does not have tracking details and customer support is not routing me any human to talk to.

The most pathetic experience I ever had with @urbancompany_UC they canceled the Services without even informing or contacting me and are mentioning in the messages that they tried contacting me but I didn’t respond. @urbancompany_UC tried contacting me in a Parallel Universe.

Urban company is a sham!

I booked a 6 sitting package for a service, availed only 1 sitting so far and guess what.. the app has a bug or intentionally I am not allowed to schedule my second sitting (screenshots in comments).

The help centre isnt helping too @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/cEPf9xfBOg
Poor service by @urbancompany_UC in mumbai!!! Never experienced earlier!!! Carpenter comes and asks for more money, and no support from customer care!!! #poorcustomerservice

Absolutely terrible experience with @urbancompany_UC and CC rep,Pankaj blatantly taking sides of unprofessional men?Registering formal complaint on @jagograhakjago @consaff for Damaged Chimney filter with shards of steel wool in it. @abhirajbhal Do you even care? @aajtak @ndtv

Very professional @urbancompany_UC 
Deep AC cleaning service 👍👍 https://t.co/Bg3gRqZqvE

The @urbancompany_UC payment selection is such a scam!
I was trying to book for a service this morning and i could not select the method that allows me to pay the service provider directly.
I was allowed to book only if i was paying UC.

My experience with @urbancompany_UC  massage service is really degrading on every new booking i make , sometimes they don’t have promised accessories , sometimes don’t have BED only
These companies are super awesome  when they start to grow after that they become careless !

That's exactly what I am questioning @urbancompany_UC @UC_Assist How come your products stop working just after warranty. The original product lasted several years, and urs 3 months??? @varunkhaitan @abhirajbhal https://t.co/tOBc4DMjQ5

Crazy pricing by @urbancompany_UC 
A charge for a lower than minimum order? Why?
Why keep the order in the very first place? 
Also no benefit for membership holders?
Crazy. 
@abhirajbhal

I know @ayushmannk likes to keep himself busy, does good work
but
अभी कुछ दिन पहले इनका (ad में) AC खराब था तो @urbancompany_UC की services लीं थीं
Was ही unsatisfied?🤔
क्या ज़रूरत पड़ गयी नया @GodrejAppliance का #Godrej AC लेने की?
खैर इसमे संतुष्ट दिख रहे हैं

🤭😄😜 https://t.co/V67Q0QbO8w

. @urbancompany_UC is good until everything goes well. Once the technician messes up a job, the real nightmare begins. UC app doesn’t have any options to directly contact customer care, you can request a callback but the callbacks are late …very late.

It was terrible experience with my AC service.Deep cleaning was done in 10mins. During the service gas refill was offered to me and when I refused then AC was fitted back immediately. Not willing to wait till the AC cooling started and asking for service end OTP. @urbancompany_UC

Continued...My registered mob no is 9711000238
@urbancompany_UC @abhirajbhal @varunkhaitan

Terrible exp with @urbancompany_UC AC service today. Deep cleaning done in 10 mins. Technician had no knowledge about AC function. Didn't fit the AC cleanly afterwards. Complete money loot by them. Local technician is better. Never use them in future. @jagograhakjago

Extremely bad experience with quality of spares used during my washing machine repair. Both parts had 3 months warranty and it took them exactly 3 months to go defunct. @urbancompany_UC  @abhirajbhal @varunkhaitan  something seriously wrong with your spare parts..Continued...

What’s the opposite of a promise?
Ans: A @urbancompany_UC Promise.

Rather than fixing my AC, ur  technician made the issue worse, & tricked me into clicking the ‘Issue Resolved’ button.

After raising the issue on your APP, still waiting for your PROMISED 8:22pm call. @UC_Assist
Nothing like a relaxed haircut at home on a holiday by an Urban Company Professional! Kudos ⁦@abhirajbhal⁩ ⁦@urbancompany_UC⁩ https://t.co/LDnqYlOhw1
Lagta hai @urbancompany_UC ko dobara se tagda investment mil gya hai fir se itta advertisement. Har content creator isko ki promote krra hai.
Thank you for your quick and efficient services regarding the issue. @UC_Assist @urbancompany_UC

This is the service of @urbancompany_UC they don’t call and they damaged my window AC this was the 6th time i called UC & there is no fix at all. The rep damaged the cooling coil & now not ready to repair #urbancompany @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/VTrN9XuEYS

One of the most anticipated sessions from #TMS2022 as @abhirajbhal gets into a deep conversation with @Accel's Abhinav Chaturvedi. Join us as Abhiraj opens up on the @urbancompany_UC journey @Inc42 https://t.co/FWkiqwax7Q

One of the most awaited sessions @Inc42's #TMS2022 -  How Urban Company Is Productising India's Home Services Industry is now live!

Speaker - @abhirajbhal from @urbancompany_UC, 
Moderator - @AbhinavC from @Accel_India 
Emcee - @bhatt_prashasti 

Join us: https://t.co/da0XOgnd4r https://t.co/jIaQrx1BeE
funny coincidence! Was looking at @urbancompany_UC 's new design system and at the same time, I get a notification of a fireside chat of the UC itself from @Inc42 https://t.co/GdV8h3HJOA

Catch @abhirajbhal, Cofounder & CEO, @urbancompany_UC and @AbhinavC, Partner, @Accel as they discuss how Urban Company is productising India's home services industry.

#TMS2022 -  https://t.co/nu2QpwpktJ https://t.co/jIvu1gL85n

An encounter of a very unprofessional behaviour by a professional cleaner of @urbancompany_UC 

1. We booked classic cleaning of Furnished apartment package of our 2bhk home, whose costing is of 3499/- and we booked the slot on 23rd April at 10:30am.

Very poor IKEA assembly I can't even imagine someone can't even do this easy task 😡😡
@IKEAIndia @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/n4d7VVTHwO
Pathetic service and harrasment by @urbancompany_UC not assign ing professional and calling and asking to cancel the booking.pls look in to it @jagograhakjago

'@urbancompany_UC The second shot of my pest control remains pending. Despite making full payment and 2 re-schedules no one turned up. I was also told I will be receiving credit of the full amount spent as compensation but the same is not reflecting anywhere

What a pathetic service by @urbancompany_UC !! 
Came to service my AC and broke the blower, now the agent can’t find the part in market and have got NO RESPONSE FROM URBAN COMPANY HELP CENTER!!
Shame on such service. 
#pathetic #service https://t.co/gG05zCdZeF

Whelp, never using 
@urbancompany_UC
 again.

The "professional" they sent broke something, lied, and said it was already broken.

We said, okay, just let us know before you start cleaning the next area so we know.

He says: No, now I don't want to work. Get a refund.

🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️

Vishal (ID/ Phone No. - 7290943851), this ID has been deactivated from Urban Company App. He is the single bread earner for his family & also provides good services. So please allow access to his ID. It will be very helpful for whole family. @abhirajbhal @urbancompany_UC

Taken AC installation & deep clean services from @nobrokercom, adavance money has been taken but their partners are unable to install outdoor Unit.  (1/n) @AmitKumarA @urbancompany_UC #boycottnobroker
I just hope @urbancompany_UC soon ventures into household maid service. We desperately need organized players in this segment.
Dear @urbancompany_UC if you are unable to provide carpenters, you should remove the service option. Tired of cancellation by professional #noprofessionalismatall

Our @UC_Assist @urbancompany_UC experience gets delightfully surreal. 
10 Days. They could not fix a machine. Supplied broken fittings. Went away with original parts that is yet to be returned.
Their response
On Twitter/Call - We will resolve it shortly.
On Mail - 
😕 https://t.co/CO7lSBUDRT https://t.co/tjP20zyZXf

.@urbancompany_UC your technician not responding to AC service warranty...working AC stopped working after your service.. paid 2700 rupees on 30th March 2022 for AC service & gas refill! #urbancompany #acservice https://t.co/bOCjQ3CmvL
Too much brand color love #UCPurple ⁦@urbancompany_UC⁩ https://t.co/SarQX9XsfN
Never ever buy the #UCPlus subscription. It's just a waste of money and a tool for @urbancompany_UC to try out new rookie professionals at the customer's expense.
Can you please do me a small favour of sending an email ? I don’t know why I have to follow up this much for my own money and your customer care service sucks!!!! @UC_Assist  @urbancompany_UC

This is how ur professionals do deep cleaning ac service....today i checked found this..in just max 20 min he completed all process using his finger to put foam...invoice number - UCIC220000809246 @UC_Assist @urbancompany_UC @ra9z @abhirajbhal https://t.co/XpPqExFn9c

I asked for air con servicefrom @urbancompany_UC and the technician who came in the guise of servicing released the gas quietly. And the ac which was working perfectly before service was inoperative after.
@urbancompany_UC then doesn't respond for days and subsequently says..
My brother wants a Boris Jonson hair cut. Is it available at your salon? @JH_JawedHabib #jawedhabib @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/XH5mvwxP5R

this is so pathetic service that I hv booked on 2.4.22 for my AC service from @urbancompany_UC @UC_Assist  with paid 448/- after that tech. visited & tech told for repaired & took 3K extra ( paid slip atchd) after that again AC is not working. still no 1 coming for repair https://t.co/3FaNdJlyPo

Fun update. So @UC_Assist spots my tweet. DMs & calls. 
"We will immediately sort your issue. Sending our person shortly".

No one turns up. 
The appliance remains broken, parts misplaced.

What remains is the great @urbancompany_UC assurance, "We will delight you, shortly". 🤦 https://t.co/EDMD2300xI
Day made !!! @urbancompany_UC great service 🌟🔆💥

Strong start today at the @FemlabC symposium by @bhavyachirps on how @urbancompany_UC responded to mental health issues during the pandemic, esp. partner facing apps changing from transactional to community oriented #gigeconomy #Mentalhealth #MentalHealthMatters #pandemic https://t.co/2TFNf3H5LO

A superb haircut with experts at your service in 30 minutes 🤩
#HaircutMatlabUCHainaYaar @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/ajKOzLCUd7
Expert hairstylists at UC will make you look amazing 😎#HaircutMatlabUCHainaYaar @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/byjRfXe9IX
Get a new look with expert stylists at your service #HaircutMatlabUCHainaYaar @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/ieOLaXXGj1

Explore a new way to groom your hair with UC 🤩
#HaircutMatlabUCHainaYaar @urbancompany_UC https://t.co/bgDQdeny8W

Coordinating for @urbancompany_UC services with my Dad 😅

*Gudpapdi aka sukhdi. Sweet made of wheat, Jaggery and ghee. https://t.co/a9tx3hkhVc

Hey @urbancompany_UC is this your business model - for your mechanics to replace the wrong part and charge a bomb and for your customer service to keep dragging conversations for weeks till service warranty is over?? Quite frustrating and disappointing.

What happens when UC writers encounter a creative block & how do they counter it? @urbancompany_UC

https://t.co/VKE1AHimKZ

How to create a horrible user exp ask @urbancompany_UC . My washing machine under appliance warranty and multiple requests but no resolution..it seems u have made only the process to sell a service and provide any actual resolution. Please either refund or i approach CC

एक window AC की servicing की बुकिंग के लिए @urbancompany_UC @UC_Assist से बंदा बुलवाया था servicing तो की नहीं bill बढ़ाने के चक्कर में AC भी खराब कर गया महाठग,
Company ने भी अभी तक कुछ नहीं किया। 
#UrbanCompany #Scammers #ConsumerProtection
#ConsumerAwareness https://t.co/cDDeG9vOfE

We are hiring @urbancompany_UC ✨

👇👇👇👇👇 https://t.co/dZpZJZu6wc

Hello, @urbancompany_UC Is your escalations team really involved in resolving pending complaints? They call up, act clueless, put the call on hold and then disconnect. I am seeking UC warranty claim for a cleaning service and @UC_Assist is dragging their feet over the issue.

Hi @IKEAIndia @urbancompany_UC I had booked a service to get my Pax Wadrobe assembled. On speaking to the person on call they said that I need to pay further to install small components like the shelves or drawers inside this. Kindly confirm regarding this at the earliest.

Roles & expectations of Designers/ Writers across levels @urbancompany_UC 

A thread 🧵 👇

I called for a technician from @urbancompany_UC for my window ac servicing and after servicing my ac got totally damaged...neither it is cooling nor the fan is working...and before it was completely ok. The technician named 'Satyam Chaubey' didn't did his job Perfect (1/1) https://t.co/K9PhoiQilE

⁦@urbancompany_UC⁩ one of the worst experiences, the executive came 20 mins late saying there was jam , I was totally late , what kind of service is this why am I charged for it https://t.co/OxestVeBFi

Hey @urbancompany_UC Can you please arrange a call with your team?
Need a tile masonry work to be done, but can't see anything relative.
Will send the contact details in DM.
Thanks.
Hi, @urbancompany_UC need some help with details of your mattress cleaning services. unable to find any customer care contact. pls assist.

Hey @urbancompany_UC today I booked AC servicing with your app and had a very very bad experience, the guy who came was a crook, he just switched on AC and it was working fine and in the name of checking he disturbed some wires and the cooling got stopped
Using @urbancompany_UC for the last time. The most horrible service, no resolution from customer support. Raising the 100th request again.

Bhavya Sharma @bhavyachirps, Associate Director of Public Relations at Urban Company @urbancompany_UC,  will be with us at #IWPE22

Register via https://t.co/lbtG7HCf3a to join us this week for interesting discussions on #futureofwork, #platformeconomy, #inclusivework, and more! https://t.co/frND3vUzsx

Hello @urbancompany_UC. 

Thanks for agreeing to repair our Washing machine & then not doing so for a week & then finally suggesting "Get it repaired from somewhere else, we will reimburse".

Only problem, you've taken away original machine parts & left behind  broken fittings.😥

Hi @UC_Assist @urbancompany_UC, I am trying to get in touch with you guys for my AC services for the last 4-5 days through the app or the number provided, but no answer. How terrible your customer services are?
Why is it so fucking hard to put a contact number for a helpline at @urbancompany_UC

Pathetic service from Urban company. I will not recommend this to anyone now. I waited for 2 days for their service but no professional was assigned till now. 

@UC_Assist @urbancompany_UC
